roleset.name: win
roleset.note: PREVAIL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'prevail' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Framenet class Suasion1. Comparison with 'beat' and 'win'. (from prevail.01-v)

example.name: intranstive
example.text: Analysts questioned whether Georgia-Pacific will ultimately prevail, saying other paper concerns may make competing bids.

example.name: all args
example.text: John finally prevailed over Mary in their battle of wits.

roleset.name: exist, continue on
roleset.note: PREVAIL-V NOTES: This sets up the adjectival usage 'prevalent'. VN class exist-47.1-1 (from prevail.02-v)

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: It said debt remained at the $1.22 billion that *trace* has prevailed since early 1989, although that compared with $911 million at Sept. 30, 1988.
